newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - San Luis Obispo, Calif..
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - San Luis Obispo, Calif..

text.p: receive sealed bids for $17,000,000* of the County's 1997-98 Tax and Revenue Anticipation Notes, at 10:00 a.m., Pacific Daylight Savings Time, on

or thereafter as established by the Auditor-Controller of the County, and communicated through Thomson Municipal News (Munifacts), not less than 24 hours prior to the time bids are to be received, at the offices of Public Financial Management, Inc., 505 Montgomery Street, Suite 800, San Francisco, California 94111, for the above notes dated July 9, 1997 and maturing July 8, 1998. Mailed bids should be sent to the Board, at the same address. NO FACSIMILE BIDS SHALL BE ACCEPTED. IF NO LEGAL OR ACCEPTABLE BID IS RECEIVED ON THE DATE SPECIFIED ABOVE, BIDS WILL BE ACCEPTED AT THE SAME PLACE AND TIME ON A LATER DATE TO BE ESTABLISHED BY THE AUDITOR-CONTROLLER OF THE COUNTY AND COMMUNICATED THROUGH THOMSON MUNICIPAL NEWS (MUNIFACTS) NOT LESS THAN 24 HOURS PRIOR TO THE TIME BIDS ARE TO BE RECEIVED. Copies of the complete Notice of Sale and copies of the Preliminary Official Statement may be obtained from the County's Financial Advisor, Public Financial Management, Inc., 505 Montgomery Street, Suite 800, San Francisco, California 94111, Attention: John Bonow.
Chair of the Board of Supervisors
